benchmark_details.name: MASTERMIND EVAL
benchmark_details.overview: MASTERMIND EVAL is a simple, scalable, and interpretable deductive reasoning benchmark inspired by the board game Mastermind, which assesses the reasoning capabilities of language models through two evaluation paradigms: agentic evaluation and deductive reasoning evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the strategic gameplay and deductive reasoning capabilities of language models using the game of Mastermind.

data.source: Generated dataset of over 30,000 pre-played game states based on the Mastermind game using Knuthâ€™s algorithm.

methodology.calculation: The solve rate is defined as the fraction of games in which the model correctly identifies the concealed code within the allowed number of guesses.
methodology.interpretation: A higher solve rate indicates better reasoning capabilities of the language model in the game.
methodology.validation: Each model plays 100 games to evaluate their performance.
